About me
Your MP for the Angus and Perthshire Glens Constituency
I am the SNP MP for Angus and Perthshire Glens having been elected in July 2024. I was previously the MP for Angus from 2019-2024.
Prior, I worked as an Aircraft Engineer within the Ministry of Defence before leaving to work in politics.
I studied Politics and International Relations at the University of Dundee, while working part-time as a taxi driver, graduating in 2011.
I was elected as a Councillor in 2012 and worked for John Swinney MSP from 2011 to 2016.
